original: split. - remember (rem n 2) as r. remember (div n 2) as q. assert (Hr: rem n 2 = r) by auto. assert (Hq: div n 2 = q) by auto. rewrite <- Hr, <- Hq. apply rem_erase with (n := q) (p := 2). rewrite Hq, Hr. now rewrite (mult_comm 2 q), plus_comm. - apply rem_2_is_0_or_1.
